title: Sunny memories of foreign lands /
author: Stowe, Harriet Beecher
snippet: It is stated inLockhart's Life of Scott, that the ruins of this castle excitedin Scott such delight and enthusiasm, that its owner urgedhim to accept for his lifetime the use of a small habitablehouse, enclosed within the circuit of the walls. After the return of the party from Hamilton Park, we satdown to an elegant lunch, where my eye was attracted more
